name: yellow (game)
description:
Can you make the screen yellow in all 50 levels?
Each level has its own logic.
Do you need help? Use the light bulb button that will appear after a while in the bottom right of each level to get a hint. There are multiple hints for each level.
With the premium unlock in-app you will not get ads before the hints.

A Bart Bonte / bontegames puzzle game.
